figure_1: Final theme map derived from the interviews.
figure_2: Frequency of references to suicide attempts by participant characteristics PRS group indicates the grouping according to scores rated on the pain resilience scale. Suicide = 0 indicates no suicide attempt; Suicide = 1 indicates with suicide attempt. Opioid = 0 indicates no use of opioid for pain control; and Opioid = 1 indicates the use of prescription opioid as a method of pain control.
